data.comment: The match has started at Nabizao.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 1, Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Anderson Daronco awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Bahia.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Claudinho.
Aderlan instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to Bahia.
Bahia push upfield and Juninho gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Bragantino defence.
Throw-in Bahia.
In the minute 7, Attention is being given to Bahiaâ€™s Lucas Fonseca and play has been suspended briefly.
Throw-in for Bahia at Nabizao.
Lucas Fonseca (Bahia) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Anderson Martins.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Bragantino are in shooting range from this free kick.
Bragantino are on the attack at Nabizao, where Luan Candido is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
In the minute 11, Goal! Claudinho extends Bragantino's lead to 2-0.
Can Bahia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bragantino's half?
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
At Nabizao, Rodriguinho has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
In the minute 17, Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
Claudinho (Bragantino) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
In the minute 18, Ligger (Bragantino) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Bahia at Nabizao.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 21, Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Ytalo puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-0.
Great play from Raul to set up the goal.
In the minute 22, Anderson Daronco awards Bragantino a goal kick.
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
Bragantino drives forward and Lucas Evangelista gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 25, Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bahia's half?
Anderson Daronco signals a Bragantino throw-in in Bahia's half.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Bragantino close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Bahia.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
In the minute 31, Anderson Daronco signals a Bragantino throw-in in Bahia's half.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Bahia just outside Bragantino's area.
Important block from the Bragantino defence as Elber fires in a strike for Bahia.
In the minute 34, Bahia have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Braganca Paulista to check on Lucas Evangelista, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 38, Lucas Evangelista for Bragantino is back on the field again.
Anderson Daronco signals a throw-in for Bahia, close to Bragantino's area.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 40, Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 44, Bragantino push forward at Nabizao and Claudinho gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Bahia defence.
Anderson Daronco will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Bragantino have a goal kick.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Throw-in for Bahia in the half of Bragantino.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Nabizao.
Free kick for Bragantino in the half of Bahia.
The away team have replaced Elias with Edson. This is the second substitution made today by Mano Menezes.
In the minute 46, Rossi is replacing Fessin for the away team.
Ball safe as Bahia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 47, It's a goal kick for the away team in Braganca Paulista.
Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
Bahia drive upfield and Gilberto gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Bragantino defender.
In the minute 49, The match at Nabizao has been interrupted briefly for a check on Raul, who is down injured.
It's now 4-0 in Braganca Paulista as Helinho scores for Bragantino.
Ytalo with an assist there.
In the minute 54, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
Raul returns to the field for Bragantino after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 56, Anderson Daronco signals a Bahia throw-in in Bragantino's half.
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Bragantino.
In the minute 57, Free kick Bragantino.
Anderson Daronco awards Bahia a goal kick.
Anderson Daronco awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Bragantino at Nabizao.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Bahia make their fourth substitution with Zeca replacing Rodriguinho.
In the minute 60, Helinho (Bragantino) has received a first yellow card.
Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
Artur of Bragantino gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 61, Bahia have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Bahia in the half of Bragantino.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 63, Gilberto is booked for the away team and will be suspended from the next match.
Can Bragantino capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Bahia!
Bahia pushes forward through Elber, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 68, Bahia have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Mauricio Barbieri is making the team's first substitution at Nabizao with Eric Ramires replacing Helinho.
Jan Hurtado is on a sub for Ytalo for Bragantino.
In the minute 70, In Braganca Paulista a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Anderson Martins (Bahia) gets booked by Anderson Daronco, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
Luan Candido (Bragantino) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 72, Corner awarded to Bragantino.
Bahia have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Bahia in Braganca Paulista.
In the minute 74, Bahia have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Throw-in Bahia.
Bragantino needs to be cautious. Bahia have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 76, The away team replace Elber with Marco Antonio.
Goal kick for Bragantino at Nabizao.
In the minute 77, Bragantino will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Bahia.
Juninho (Bahia) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Braganca Paulista.
In the minute 78, Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 81, Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Weverton is on a sub for Aderlan for Bragantino.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
The home team replace Lucas Evangelista with Matheus Jesus.
Bragantino's Artur is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
In the minute 84, Corner awarded to Bragantino.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Bahia close to the penalty box.
Artur (Bragantino) has received a yellow card from Anderson Daronco.
In the minute 85, Bahia's Zeca gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bragantino defender.
Gregore's header is off-target for Bahia.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Braganca Paulista.
In the minute 86, Anderson Daronco signals a Bahia throw-in in Bragantino's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 88, Free kick Bahia.
Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
In the minute 89, Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bragantino make their fifth substitution with Cesar Haydar replacing Ligger.
At Nabizao the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Bragantino are coming forward and Claudinho gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Anderson Daronco awards Bahia a goal kick.
Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Bahia attack but Juninho's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Bragantino at Nabizao.
The second-half is over. The match ends 4-0.
